ai-anya-e0605n24:2_0: Being rightly destroyed, cleansed to the spotless awakening,
ai-anya-e0605n24:3_0: When I’m blessed with good fortune, I’m happy, and cheered to awakening.
ai-anya-e0605n24:4_0: For seven days he died in this way, and at least he died without exertion.
ai-anya-e0605n24:5_0: Brahmadeva’s should be told in the same way as the supreme wheel-turning monarch.
